民生 · 进出口食品

People's livelihood · Import and export food

首页 < 产业布局 < 民生产业 < 民生 · 进出口食品

重庆海领齐力机械设备有限公司   全资子公司

Chongqing Hailing Qili Machinery Equipment Co., Ltd.   Wholly-owned subsidiary

领食航是一家专注于国际贸易的股份制企业，成立于2016年 6月，注册资本2000万元人民币。
公司位于重庆自贸区内，毗邻渝新欧国际铁路专线重庆空港站、 重庆保港区专用码头和重庆江北国际机场，坐拥水陆空优势，交通 运输十分便捷。
公司拥有一支对国际食品采销和经营能力极强的精英团队，由资深的领导团队和高素质、业务能力过硬的员工团队组成，其中资深领导团队均为有十年以上行业背景及执行经验的高管和董事。主要经营产品涉及：牛肉、猪肉、羊肉、鸡肉及其副产品、海产品、粮油、食品等，客户已遍布世界各国。
作为重庆自贸区全球贸易的核心成员之一，本着“助力中国中小微食品企业发展”的理念,依托优越的区位优势、丰富的行业经验， 广泛的资源渠道和专业的服务团队，为中小微食品企业提供集全球采购、冷链物流、保税仓储、通关服务为一体的一站式国际食品供应链平台；同时拥有完善的全球食品安全追溯体系，保障进出口食品的品质及安全。
It is a joint-stock company specializing in international trade. It was established in June 2016 with a registered capital of RMB 20 million.
The company is located in the Chongqing Free Trade Zone, adjacent to the Chongqing Airport Station of Chongqing-Sinkiang-Europe International Railway, the specialized wharf of Free Trade Port of Chongqing, and Chongqing Jiangbei International Airport. It enjoys the advantage of land, sea and air, and the transportation is very convenient.
The company has an elite team with strong ability in international food purchase，sales and business operations. It is composed of a senior leadership team and a team of highly qualified and capable employees. The all of the senior executives and directors in senior leadership team has more than 10 years of industry background and implementation experience. Executives and directors. The main products are: beef, pork, mutton, chicken and its by-products, seafood, grain and oil, foodstuff, etc. Customers have spread all over the world.
As one of the core members of the global trade in Chongqing Free Trade Zone, adhering to the concept of “helping the development of small and medium micro food enterprises in China”, relying on superior location advantages, rich industry experience, extensive resource channels and professional service teams, it provides a one-stop international food supply chain platform integrating global procurement, cold chain logistics, bonded warehousing and customs clearance services for small and
